channel.title: How do I set a timer on pking? because people keep massing
channel.description:
Hi does anyone no how to set a timer, do you can only click every 4 seconds, does anyone no how to set this. Because it is lagging my server up.
Many Thanks.
Musicmad441[br][size=1]Posted on: 16-09-2007, 15:54:20[/size][hr]Please, I really need this.
